name: Interactive diorama
description:
My goal with this assignment was to start getting into details of environment creation. I used a create random object script so each time you open the game, new scene is generated. I wanted to script such that the objects created would connect at least on one side, unfortunately I couldn't figure it out. 

So with this assignment I focused on randomizing environment and object creation with a player.  I had multiple errors with unity and version using a third player template like I was not able to program any OnKeyPress actions.

How to play :

WASD to move player

Space to jump 

Mouse to move
